Website: www.tcfusa.org Donate: www.tcfusa.org/donate.php
The Citizens Foundation, USA (TCF-USA) funds schools and educational programs for underprivileged children in Pakistan. The schools are designed, built and operated by The Citizens Foundation - Pakistan’s largest not-for-profit organization in the education sector. The Board of Directors of TCF-USA has complete discretion over allocation of funds and the grants it makes. Additionally, funds may also be granted for other charitable or educational programs.
TCF-USA is a tax exempt 501(c) (3) organization, incorporated in Illinois. Donations are tax deductible.
TCF-USA actively works to raise funds and awareness through community outreach. We are a volunteer based organization with Support Groups in most regions of the U.S.
TCF-USA believes that education is a basic human right, a pre-requisite for democratic institutions to flourish in Pakistan and for its people to compete in a global economy
